titulo: El Gato Bandido, Dramatizacion De La Fabula De Rafael Pombo (Texto Completo) [Bandit Cat ]
descripcion:
The bandit cat desired to become evil, and then everything went wrong. One of Pombo's most famous fables is the basis for this delightful dramatization. Pombo was a poet born in Bogota, Colombia. He studied engineering, became a diplomat, was a member of Parliament, and is considered to be one of the greatest poets and narrators of Spanish-American romanticism. He achieved his greatest popularity with the children's stories included in his book Cuentos Rimados, such as "Sim칩n El Bobito", "Do침a P치nfaga", "Renacuajo paseador", "Cutufato y su gato", "Pastorcita", "La Pobre Viejecita", and "El ni침o y la mariposa".
Note: This is audiobook is in Spanish.
